amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 115-679 to expand USDA's ability to assess natural resource concerns through enhanced measurement, evaluation, and reporting on conservation program outcomes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Faso amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Faso.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Faso amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
